content: granny squares are all the rage right now although they never completely went out of fashion i made this festive design especially in honour of the 10th anniversary of dutch crochet magazine aan de haak and it s available to everyone as a free pattern the 3d flower pops up in the middle of this granny square which you can use for anything you like think of a bunting line a bag a pillow or to pimp your clothing of course i used recycled yarn where the lurex in the yarn provides an extra festive glitter accent i hope you enjoy it materials needed for 1 granny square size approx 12x12 cm 3 colours hoooked odyssey lurex 60% recycled cotton 20% other recycled fibres 20% lurex 50 g = approx 90 m per ball for 1 granny square approx 6 - 7 grams per colour are needed
